home.heroSubtitle: ONE-DNA™ is not a product. It's a design philosophy that enables circularity from the very first molecule.
home.problemTitle: The Problem with Conventional Artificial Grass
home.problemDescription: Traditional artificial grass is designed for performance, not for end-of-life. Mixed materials make recycling impractical, leading to landfill and incineration.
home.solutionDescription: ONE-DNA™ products are designed from a single material family, enabling true recyclability and closing the loop on artificial grass.

claims.transparencyDescription: ONE-DNA™ is committed to avoiding greenwashing. This section provides clear framing of claims, evidence, and limitations.

sustainability.disclaimerText: ONE-DNA™ is committed to transparency and avoiding greenwashing. All sustainability claims on this platform are supported by evidence and clearly framed within their applicable scope. Design intent and technical potential are distinguished from real-world implementation outcomes, which depend on proper installation, maintenance, and end-of-life processing by qualified partners.

meta.defaultTitle: ONE-DNA™ | System-Level Sustainability for Artificial Grass
meta.defaultDescription: ONE-DNA™ is a design philosophy enabling circularity from the first molecule. Explore our evidence-driven approach to sustainable artificial grass systems.
